name: Puppy Ultimate Edition
short_description:
PUE is an Operating System that fills a niche for Users who use older computers and require a complete set of applications at their disposal.  This project's starting date stretches back to 2009.

This system is based on a JWM/ROX filer; that has been configured to provide the integrated ease of use that a Desktop Environment provides, while using minimal System resources.  This minimalisations do not compromise form and function!

PUE is designed to maximise system resources allowing even heavy apps to work on minimal hardware.  It is the intention of the author that all applications work within the limit of 128mbs and 32mb gForce Video Card and able to operate from an 8gb USB flashdrive

New release Apps will be incorporated if they conform to design parameters; however, if function compromises resources then it is not considered.

Code and scripting unique to PUE will be uploaded here; whereas the primary iso download will be offsite and links provided.
summary: Based upon Puppy Linux 3.01 Operating System kernel 2.6.19.7
